EXTRACTED VALUE: There's nothing broken here, but combat lacks flair and strategy is insignificant. [Jan 2008, p.68]
The control is a little clumsy, and there are a few bugs that'll drive you to drink.
Technically-crippled, but inspired and amusing, dumb arcadey fun.
But the gameplay is unnecessarily complicated, with the busy HUD being the worst example. [Nov 2008, p.75]
Hard Evidence offers few surprises and even fewer challenges throughout its five undemanding murder mysteries.
As the saying goes, "If it ain't broke, don't fix it." And the classic Bomberman was definitely not broken.
I can live with a bit of choppy framerate or occasional clipping in a game (of which little is found here), but what I can't stand is boring gameplay.
In a word, this game is ugly.
